entry.string: The XarLDAP module allows you to configure an LDAP server that Xaraya will use for authentication or searching.
You must configure XarLDAP before you can successfully authenticate a user with the AuthLDAP module or search the LDAP server.
From the menu, you have the following choices:.
Modify Config -- From here, you can configure the LDAP server.
entry.translation: Konfiguration ändern - Hier können Sie den LDAP-Server konfigurieren.

entry.string: Test Connnection -- Test the connection the LDAP server.
entry.translation: Verbindung testen - Die Verbindung zum LDAP-Server testen

entry.string: There are no included blocks with the XarLDAP Module
entry.translation: Das XarLDAP-Modul verfügt über keine eigenen Blöcke

entry.string: The XarLDAP module has no hooks included at this time.
Further information on the Xarldap module can be found at
Click on Version History tab at the bottom to get the latest release information.
Related tutorials and documentation on Xarldap found at
